SmoothPolygon Black_Rapids_Outline_1980 B:\2_Black_Rapids\Data\AOI_Outlines_Centerlines\Black_Rapids_Outline_1980_sm.shp PAEK "25 Meters" FIXED_ENDPOINT FLAG_ERRORS

dataIdInfo.idAbs:
Completed work V_6_0(ck):

  • Updated divides using Evans velocity fields

  • Added names outside of National Parks and created a name point shapefile

  • Updated "Glactype" using the tidewater and lakecalving point shapefiles

********************************************************************************************************

Completed work V_5_6(jr):

  • Checked double names and recalculated GLIMS_ID and areas.

********************************************************************************************************

Completed work V_5_5(ck):

  • Checked the glacier divides throughout the state (more divides were added than deleted, which increased the number of glaciers).

********************************************************************************************************

Completed work V_5_4(ck):

  • Improved Nunataks in Chugach Mountains Area by using Sam's nunataks or digitizing from Landsat scenes.

  • Divides for glaciers with more than 1 terminus adapted according to the standards of the laser altimetry group

  • To deal with all the small slivers: Polygons < 25000 m2 eliminated, if still there after elimination, then deleted.

  • Adapted some of the termini of larger glaciers around Malaspina Glacier

********************************************************************************************************

Completed work V_5_2 (jr):

  • Naming consistently (lower case throughout)

  • Dates further improved (8 characters throughout)

********************************************************************************************************

Completed work V_5_1 (ck):

  • Edited more than 1000 errors (mostly divides using hillshades and contours)

  • Roughly edited mayor Nunataks in the Chugach area

  • Saved dates consistently (YYYYMMDD)

  • Deleted smallest polygons (< 0.01 km2)

attr.attrdef: Length of feature in internal units.
